The PhD was completed in November 2013 and most of the contents of this manuscript are included in the PhD thesis. It is common in Norway for a PhD thesis to consist of an introduction followed by a collection of articles published during the PhD period. This article could unfortunately not be finished completely before the PhD thesis had to be submitted to the University and the unfinished manuscript was included in the thesis as an article in preparation. Author Gansel hopes this does not interfere with regulations regarding double publishing of the contents of this manuscript. All authors were employed at SINTEF Fisheries and Aquaculture at the time the experiments were planned and conducted. Two authors did in the meantime change their job and are now working for commercial companies (den Norske Veritas and Statoil).
